MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL30 postcode area of Llandudno, affecting properties in Mostyn St, Clonmel St and surrounding area.  We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our team onsite are carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.42am on 28th of Jan 2021.
